line.annotation: create_ing(ing12, "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan.
Mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4}, ing16, "flour mix", "")

line.originaltext: Make a well in the center and add sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing17, "batter", "make a well in the center of the flour mix and put sugar, oil, eggs, and vanilla in it")

line.originaltext: Mix with wooden spoon until smooth.
Mix with wooden spoon until smooth.
Stir in carrots, coconut, walnuts and pineapple.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing18, ing9}, ing19, "fruit batter", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t0, ing20, "cake", "bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes")

line.originaltext: Don't panic, the center will sink a little.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing20,"don't panic, the center will sink a little")

line.originaltext: To make the frosting: Cream the butter and cream cheese until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing14}, ing21, "frosting start", "cream until smooth")

line.originaltext: Add the confectioners sugar and beat until creamy.
